logentry.author: thesmilyface
logentry.msg:
Improvements: -------------- New design for the options dialog Added some new hidden features (please see help file for more informations) Added some new setup commandline parameters (use the parameter /? for more details) Added a new test page
Bug Fixes: ---------- Fixed some minor bugs.

logentry.author: thesmilyface
logentry.msg: Added a toolbar Added a msi package Added a ppd with ~70 paper sizes Improve the behaviour of the commandline switch -PF (tested with hundred of office files, wildcards are possible like this -PF"C:\docs\*.doc", added a status window and it is possible to cancel the job) Added "Lotus Notes" support for the email feature Added some new hidden features Fixed some minor bugs

Improvements: - Using GPL-Ghostscipt 8.15
Bug Fixes: - Missing msmapi32.ocx is included. - Improve email support. - Terminalserver should work - Using a modifies ghostpdf.ppd - fixed english.ini - Fixed some minor bugs.
